abstract: Vows column on wedding of Bridget Nugent and Dean Reineking.
lead_paragraph: The couple was ready to build a life together. But first, they needed to help restore the bride’s family home.

headline.main: Bridget Nugent and Dean Reineking: Embracing an Adventure of a Lifetime
headline.print_headline: Embracing an Adventure of a Lifetime

snippet: The couple was ready to build a life together. But first, they needed to help restore the bride’s family home.
